titles.title: To extend the reduction of duty on Bifenthrin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
12/18/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2011, the reduction of duty on (2-Methyl[1,1'-biphenyl]-3-yl)methyl 3-(2-chloro-3,3,3-trifluoro-1-propenyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate (Bifenthrin).
